evals.prompt: I just increased the enclosure depth from 205mm to 215mm and reduced the height from 264mm to 255mm to compensate volume. Update all the docs and commit.
evals.expected_output: Agent should update claude.md (new session entry, locked params table), README.md (specs table), and analysis.md (volume, port tuning, dimensional verification). Then explain changes and git commit with proper message.

assertions.name: updates_claude_md
assertions.description: Adds new session entry and updates locked params in claude.md

assertions.name: updates_analysis
assertions.description: Updates volume and clearance numbers in analysis.md

assertions.name: explains_before_commit
assertions.description: Explains changes to user before committing

assertions.name: proper_commit_message
assertions.description: Uses conventional commit format with Co-authored-by trailer

evals.prompt: I changed the port y_offset from 52 to 58. What docs need updating?
evals.expected_output: Agent should identify: claude.md locked params table (port_y_offset), analysis.md ยง1.6 Port Placement and ยง3.3 Port Tube clearances. README.md likely doesn't need changes since the specs table doesn't list port_y_offset directly.

assertions.name: identifies_claude_sections
assertions.description: Identifies locked params table in claude.md

assertions.name: identifies_analysis_sections
assertions.description: Identifies ยง1.6 and ยง3.3 in analysis.md

assertions.name: readme_minimal
assertions.description: Notes README.md needs minimal or no changes for this parameter
